website_summaries.verdict: A classic style watch with bold details that is tough enough to be worn daily. The leather wristband may need replacement after a year or so.
pros: Bold styling, reminiscent of classic aviator or diver watches
Watch itself is sturdily built and resists scratching, standing up to daily wear and tear
cons: Wristband and its metal parts can deteriorate after several months

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and everything works perfectly. I only had to remove a few links by tapping the pins, no screws, super easy. Compared it to known replicas and originals. This is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Its a watch.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I only needed a watch for work. I had seen these in stores, and they were eye catching. I bought this one because it was about as basic as I needed. It fits well after I purchased a band adjusting kit. It does get attention from anyone that sees it. But that is where the positives end. It's just a piece of jewelry. The date is in a bad spot and hard to see. It keeps time very well, but there is no back light. Nothing in the watch even glows, so don't expect to use it in dim/dark areas. Had I known this from the beginning, I would have chose a different watch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL and BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and it did not disappoint! The watch itself is super cool looking. The iridescent face is literally a head turner. People have stopped in their tracks to ask where the watch came from and to admire it. My boyfriend works in Aviation for the Navy and is able to wear it to work with no problems and he loves it. Definitely a great steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: morena25

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this watch for my friend, but when I got it I could not stop wearing it. I just had to buy a new one for me. It goes so well with all my modern clothes, sport, casual and classic. Branding is not emphasized, and its really smooth. I have skinny wrist and it fits perfectly. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fancy looking watch...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is big...The reddish orange face makes the numbers look like they glow and actually makes them easier to read... I can tell people like it because I’ve noticed Ive gotten a lot of looks wearing it...
customer_reviews.author: J. Lafreniere

customer_reviews.title: The Underdog
customer_reviews.text: This watch was exactly what I was looking for. I just started buying watches a little bit over 3 years ago, and I found that each brand of watches has it own unique feel to it. This Diesel watch is amazing and it is a head turner. Contrary to belief, I actually love the dial's bright orange reflection. That was made intentionally to draw in your attention to realize who beautiful the time piece is. Overall, I love this watch, and I expect to buy more of these products very soon.
customer_reviews.author: NewLite

customer_reviews.title: The watch face reflects a beautiful orange/reddish hue and is complimented by a dark face ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He's been eyeing this watch for years and he absolutely loves it! Some may have issues with the large size of the watch and can be a bit overwhelming for someone with small wrists; but nonetheless it is stunning and is up to your personal preference. The watch face reflects a beautiful orange/reddish hue and is complimented by a dark face behind the glass. There is no glow to the watch numbers. As a tip, we took the watch to buckle to get some links taken out as it was too large straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Certified used!
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging look good and the watch looked great. There were no scratches on the watch and all the original protective stickers were on it, but the watch did not work right out of the box. I went to set the time on the watch, pulled out on the crown and the whole crown rod came out of the watch. Amazon is in the process of returning it, it’s taking forever to get my return so I couldn’t order another one before my job interview... very disappointing transaction. This watch was supposed to be Amazon certified used in “like new condition”, it looked good but was clearly and obviously non operational. This should have never been allowed to pass QA.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I originally saw it at Macys and instantly fell in love with the black gunmetal finish and "Tron-like" blue that accents it really well. If you're into really big faced watches like I am 10/10 would def recommend. This watch is also much lighter than other big faced watches which is really surprising considering how big it is! I bought this watch for $180, which is definitely a steal because they sold it for $240 at Macys!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Bold Elegant Quality Watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Diesel, and it is perfect. High quality and very bold; elegant watch. The price is good as well compared to department stores. If you extra links you can get them from Fossil, as Diesel watches are made by them.
customer_reviews.author: Winder Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift. Only kept the correct time for about the 1st week. Sent it in for repair. Got it back and within 15 minutes, was already behind a few minutes. Requested a refund. Only option is to send it back again for repair. I know it won’t work when we get it back again. (I still need to return it for the 2nd time ... but I shouldn’t even HAVE to have it repaired THIS SOON! It didn’t even work for 2 months, let alone 15 minutes once the repair was completed.) Not happy. Just really want a refund. Would rate 0 stars but it’s not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars it's a pretty nice Watch but the timer second hand doesn't zero out completely. where the data is it's just the date not the month or the year even though there is plenty of space for it. The metal band has started to bend and break. It only have so many metal links you can replace. I will be contacting the buyer about a new band ! Update watch battery just stopped working cannot get it replaced and warranty does not cover battery so now I have a useless $200 Watch
customer_reviews.author: Master K

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful stylish watch, with great design and superb quality! I recommend for people with large hands!)))
customer_reviews.author: Gennady

customer_reviews.title: Favorite watch by far
customer_reviews.text: I don't consider myself a guy that likes massive watch faces (and trust me, this one is big), but it DEFINITELY grew on me. Favorite watch by far. You are pretty much guaranteed to get comments on it every time you wear it. Something about the reflection just pops and catches peoples eye. Dove into a salty river with it on and it is perfectly water "resistant", basically waterproof. I had no issues after I got out of the river. I am pretty careless when it comes to being delicate with watches, but so far mine barely has any marks on it. All around great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The gold color went out at the first month... and it gets broken in the second month. I do not recoment this watch.... it is not an original diesel product....
customer_reviews.author: Andres David Valdez Then

customer_reviews.title: Cool Reddish Blue Tint, priced same as Outlet stores
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for watches with tinted glasses then look no further. The reddish-blue tint on the glass display makes this watch absolutely cool. It's heavy and a bit big in size, so keep that in mind. We had bought a similar watch from an outlet store for the same price, so the price of $152 coupled with Amazon convenience makes it a worthwhile buy. And yes it comes boxed in an original Diesel watch case.
customer_reviews.author: Hariprasad Jayakumar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful whatch
customer_reviews.text: I have received this watch yesterday and I like it so much. It is nice, brigthfull and gives conversation's start excuses. I recommend it to all who has doubt about size. For real it is not too big as you migth think when you read 68mm size. It gives to you personality and style.
customer_reviews.author: Edilio

customer_reviews.title: It speaks for itself
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a birthday gift for my husband. All I can say about this watch is wow it’s a super nice looking watch very bold. My husband loves the way it reflects the light and how the blue appears to glow. He has gotten quite a few compliments already. By the way Diesel watches are made by fossil watch.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B

customer_reviews.title: Bold Gold | Bold & Gold
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite watches. I would rate this 10 out of 10. Its a high quality Diesel materials. It feels good. Catches a lot of good attention. Very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: DAG

customer_reviews.title: Looks great without being too flashy.
customer_reviews.text: Look, weight, and size are great. The band feels solid and face and markings are precise and clear. Only complaint is the size of the date. It is ridiculously small. Not just small for the scale of the watch but small even if it were on a face the size of a nickel. Couple that with the date's placement between the two prongs means that there is usually a shadow cast on it making it even harder to read unless turned just right. Not horrible but doubt I could see it without my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Ok I've literally had this watch for long enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok I've literally had this watch for long enough to give a real owners review. This watch is so worth every penny spent. I wear this watch daily after work just because everybody assumes its a 1000 dollar watch, its Flashy, its masculine, and the gold will defiantly make a man, or whoever see it compliment it. I had an Arab wanting to trade his watch and chain in a convenient store for my watch. I'm being real I'm 5 stars with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Damarlon DeBose

customer_reviews.title: Use caution if you have large wrists.  Free returns made this an easy return.
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it a 4 rating even though I had to return it. Very nice looking watch and the face is larger and heavier than what I expected but as a big man I was ok with that. But the leather band was too small. I have large wrists/arms but certainly not giant ones. I couldn't even get the last hole secured. Back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, heavy, somewhat lacking
customer_reviews.text: Big, stylish, heavy. As I hoped. Band is super loud and creaky when it moves, and the links are black plated after band assembly, so if you push them up or down you can see the un-blacked steel in between. kinda shoddy for the price. I like wearing it but the links start to irritate after a full work day. 3/5
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, glass has a nice effect that transitions ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, glass has a nice effect that transitions orange and blue, and love how the numbers look. A big sticking point for me is always the font used on calendars, and this one actually appears to be consistent (if slightly oddly sized) with the rest of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Moran

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for my collection. Don't wear it often because it is a huge watch. Keeps perfect time and I love the rugged style of it. Definitely catches people's eye. It came packaged well and cost was affordable. I recommend this item and seller to others who want a nice rugged looking timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Dave N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Father's Day Present
customer_reviews.text: I received the Diesel watch as a fathers day gift, from the woman I'm related to by marriage and daughter. I love the grey finish, gunmetal; was worried that the the band was to small but it wasn't nice snug fit. The watch face is large There is a date, two second hand indicators and a minute indicator. Comes in a nice storage case with instructions. Has "Only the Brave" at the the top of the watch case. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. First of all, you can not use the watch after sun set cos it doesn't illuminate in the night. Second, it is cheaply made and started to fall apart in 6 months. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yoseph Semai

customer_reviews.title: This watch is amazing. The quality is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This watch is amazing. The quality is outstanding, the packaging is on point and it has super-exceeded all my expectations. Take my word for it you will not regret purchasing this watch. I am in love. It looks very very expensive, I am extremely happy with my decision to purchase this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Simmy

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and a great price
customer_reviews.text: The box is a bit well girlish. But the watch is amazing! It was a bit large and we had to remove 2 links. But my boyfriend loves it. It was hard to find a large faced watch with metal that was black. But Diesel came through. This watch is stunning. My bf is 6'2 and it fits him just right! I can't explain enough how great this watch looks on him. I am happy with the purchase and even happier I got it for a good price. Under 200!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding from every angle.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in every way..... works flawlessly and is almost in sync with a RW watch I own which is worth almost 15 times what this cost..... looks like a high-end watch which will fit every environment from a black tie event to a lazy weekender. Be warned though that this is a BIG watch...... this is NOT a bad thing if you're like me who loves watches that a bigger than the normal. Highly recommended in every way. Amazon delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: RetVAFireMan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who is picky when it comes to watches. He absolutely loved it. It looks really nice and eye catching. Only complaint is the links were not enough to shorten the watch, it’s way too huge, had to go get it adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a birthday gift for my boyfriend. The watch is stunning and really catches your attention. I really think this watch is versatile (dress it up or down). The only problem is that I wish the packaging was more taken care of.The booklet inside was really scratched up and I bought this watch NEW. Not a big deal for me since it's just the booklet and not the watch itself that was scratched, but maybe for a watch collector it might be.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel that product is original, there is no guarantee card or any proof that it's from diesel except the logo on the watch. Even the image is not as shown in the image. It was shown that the dial has two colors in the image bit it consists of only one color. I don't feel that it's the original product. Even the package(box of diesel) is open. I don't expect this from DIESEL. So I feel the product is fake.
customer_reviews.author: Thumma jeevan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, especially the way the glass makes it look different colors in different light... Fits great also...
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch didn’t come with instructions but found one online. Looks great and many compliments. Don’t know about water resistant since haven’t had it in water. Value for the money I guess is good if the tag on the watch truly represents actual retail price in store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Watch... HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is AMAZING! It looks sooo sleek and expensive! Awesome quality! I bought it for my boyfriend, and he LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.author: AutyB87

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly nice and overall pleasing
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly well made and outstanding looks. It's exactly what I wanted, and looks even better in person. The picture doesn't do it justice, but the silver is much more darker. Almost gunmetal
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not for a Gift..
customer_reviews.text: Well I got this watch for my dad as a Gift. Box of the watch came in horrible condition, watch it self seemed like it was used and repacked. Only one little tiny scratch. Reason for not returning was because it was the last one when I got it. Love the watch though!
customer_reviews.author: LoCi

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is bigger than I expected it to be but the color and style of this watch is remarkable and awesome! This is now the watch that I wear most regularly. You may have to get the wrist band adjusted when you first get them though. The size of the watch may require getting used to, since this is a fairly big watch. Love this Watch!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ha

customer_reviews.title: or a knock off like purses you but from wig stores
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was used, or a knock off like purses you but from wig stores. But it looked exactly like a Diesel Watch and was in brand new condition. Packaging was great! Shipping was fast. True to description and detail! With Amazon Prime i saved over $120 so i am extremely happy and hope my man is even happier when he opens it!
customer_reviews.author: PorscheAlise

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt have asked for anything better.
customer_reviews.text: Every year since my son was 17 have bought him a watch. He loves to wear and collect. This watch raised eyebrows, brought a huge smile and immediately went on his wrist. Couldnt have asked for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch! Excellent Price!
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is awesome! Looks great! Feels great! I immediately replaced the band for a leather one. Wasn't too thrilled about the metal band it came with. But to each is own.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch. The glass makes the dial look like it's glowing. Recieved a lot of compliments. This is a large face and a little on the bulky side. Took some time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Anet

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch! Kepp in mind that this watch is big! Great quality and looks incredible, 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mikeiza

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually wearing it as I write this review...It's perfect. I haven't figured out how to set the date on it...but it comes with an instruction book. I love the look and weight of the watch. Its a larger face but it's not so big that its annoying. After I had the links taken out at my local Belk jewelry counter it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: totojo

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Looks great on
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Looks great on. A bit heavy but that's what I wanted so that's a good thing. Lots of compliments on it. Only complaint was packaging was damaged during shipment but watch was perfectly fine. The customer made the transaction right after the storage box was damaged. Great experience and great product!
customer_reviews.author: James J. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and the person loved it. However I thought the face was a little too big for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the most stylish watches I have ever seen! typical diesel
customer_reviews.author: ENZO PANARITO

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing watch that looks much better in person
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing watch that looks much better in person. It's big and bold. The band is high in quality and has a semi worn/rustic look to it.
customer_reviews.author: ebuttah

customer_reviews.title: Good watch for broad wrist.....
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice watch and people will notice it without fail. I have received quite many appraises for this one... But one should be extremely careful about the dial size.. its a very big dial and dont suit all.. it suited me alot... Also the watch i expected to be a more brighter in appearance, it is bit dull as compared to photos but over all it si a very good watch...highly recommended!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pan

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift was appreciated; he loved it! Wears it regularly. No complaints as of yet, but again, it hasn't been long.
customer_reviews.author: herz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and beautiful yet very masculine watch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and beautiful yet very masculine watch. Good weight and high quality. Quite large but that is the style. I have slim wrists but the watch still looks great. I have the black with gold as well as the gunmetal. I love both!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DanLou

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and beautiful yet very masculine watch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and beautiful yet very masculine watch. Good weight and high quality. Quite large but that is the style. I have slim wrists but the watch still looks great. I have the black with gold as well as the gunmetal. I love both!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DanLou

customer_reviews.title: The band is holding it back.
customer_reviews.text: Out off the box the bracelet was broken and the very thin black paint had been scuffed like someone had been wearing it for a while. Something tells me this was a return that made it to my doorstep by accident. I don't think I'll try to order another one. The bracelet felt cheaply made (loose tolerances allowing the links to flex perpendicular to the band), which is a shame because the watch face is pretty striking.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jones

customer_reviews.title: Watchman
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Quick on delivery. Love this product. Will be ordering more...
customer_reviews.author: Marion James

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding watch 🤩 it’s my favorite watch and it came in perfect condition and it’s really beautiful and all my family and friends love it
customer_reviews.author: William carcamo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I Love These Watches!!! This Makes My 6th One To Date, All Different Colors And Styles... Great Product... Nice Heavy Watch...
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I got complimented so many times on my watch by friends. I highly recommend it. Fits nice, it's comfortable, and looks very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Erman

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but can't keep time
customer_reviews.text: The watch will not keep time. Every time I set the watch the next day it is off by 3 - 4 minutes. I cannot trust the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Broberg

customer_reviews.title: Neither too conservative nor too flashy.
customer_reviews.text: My main object in buying a watch is to keep the time. This one does it accurately. It also looks and feels good (not too big but a tad bigger than most; neither too conservative nor too flashy). I've given it four stars because the bracelet lock does not fit as snugly as I think it should, but it detracts nothing from overall looks and feel. Moreover, Macy's was happy to adjust the sizing for me. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: They removed my last review for being honest with this watch so I'll just say I love it and it gets a lot of attention.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: this is the best and most original they've designed
customer_reviews.text: As Diesel watches go, this is the best and most original they've designed. Blue/Orange glass is exotic and incessantly cool
customer_reviews.author: Ericstudio

customer_reviews.title: Mega Chief is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The Mega Chief is perfect! This is my second Diesel Watch. Price was perfect! And if you guys like the BIG watch face.?this is the watch for you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle 1

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I is beautiful and very large. If you like large watches this is a must have. It is unique and so far it keeps great time. Very awesome.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyBear

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Received this for my birthday. Love the size, not too large and solid quality as to be expected from Diesel.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I trust and love Diesel for the craftsmanship of its products from clothes ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give a zero star if it were possible, but I have to give at least one, unfortunately. I'm not complaining about the quality of the watch, I trust and love Diesel for the craftsmanship of its products from clothes to accessories. But how can whoever is selling this watch send me a used one when I was expecting a new for the money spent? I'm returning it to buy a new one.. Beware of dishonest seller.
customer_reviews.author: John Kenneth Lafalaise

customer_reviews.title: A man's wath
customer_reviews.text: Get multiple complements on this watch whenever I wear it. Love it and high recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JUNBUGG

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. I always get compliments on this watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. I always get compliments on this watch. It was a little bugger than expected but great product. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great time piece, beautiful color, just a bit larger then expected but nice
customer_reviews.author: Lyann Ohland

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice looking watch. Came in the box with all the original tags and was unscratched. The quality of the metal is okay, it feels like it’ll get scratched easily. I wish the the thickness of the band was thicker compared to the size of the face. Nonetheless, nice looking watch, not too expensive, arrived brand new, and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite watches. Looks great and has a good feel to it on the wrist. I get loots of compliments on this
customer_reviews.author: derik

customer_reviews.title: Big watch
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch,, really cool color on the dial. My bad, I don’t really like oversize watches. I knew it was big when I bought it, so no surprise there. The dial is worth the purchase. Very intriguing.
customer_reviews.author: buck J. Mabile

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT FOR THE MAN IN YOUR LIFE
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND WILL LOVE THIS WATCH....IT'S A HANDSOME LOOKING WATCH
customer_reviews.author: doc R.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE !!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT WATCH. A MUST HAVE. If anyone is a big collector on watches this is the watch to have in the collection. Diesel gets my approval.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awsome, looks good and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E.

customer_reviews.title: Watch face is definitely big, but that was part ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch face is definitely big, but that was part of what I was after. I'm 6'4' and wanted the "big face" to actually still appear large on someone of my stature. Mission accomplished. Doesn't have the capability to see the time after dark, which wasn't an issue for me, but might be notable to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: ezenbrowntown

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Bought As a gift for my husband. He was very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: The glass is one of the coolest things I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Luberus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece.
customer_reviews.text: After many frustrations with Invicta Watches, my husband and I wanted to try another maker. BEAUTIFUL watch. First saw it at Macy's. My husband is very much into nice dress watches. This is definitely a show stopper and conversation piece. Definitely a great pick for a larger man. He's very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: It looks better in your hand than you ever imagine with pictures
customer_reviews.text: It looks better in your hand than you ever imagine with pictures. It is a "must" if you want to be o the top of views, everybody loves my new watch an I love it much more. Totally recommend it. Because of its size, I think should be used by people with strong or thick arms, in thin arm persons it look too much oversized.
customer_reviews.author: Edilio

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are spot on!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! Looks exactly like the pics! It’s a Christmas gift so not sure about the water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: ddz

customer_reviews.title: I lost my money with this purchase...
customer_reviews.text: I lost my money with this purchase... The watch arrived damage, defective... It doesn't work... It is a shame...
customer_reviews.author: Diego6sic6

customer_reviews.title: NICE WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I just love it, feels good on the hand, not to heavy fo the size, the wristband is not real leather but feels good do
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Franco

customer_reviews.title: Like the watch for the most part
customer_reviews.text: I like big watches. Had it for over a year now. Keeps good time. Date is a little hard to see. The other little problem I've noticed is that the stopwatch seconds hand somehow does not reset to 0 any more. Instead it goes to 5. But those secondary dials are so small, I never use them anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: ONLY THE BRAVE...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is AMAZING!! Its not so flashy as the silver or gold colored watches, but ANYONE who sees it will admit that you have a quality timepiece. And for the nay-sayers who say that this watch is too big... it CLEARLY STATES on the front and back of the watch ONLY THE BRAVE ***UPDATE*** I bought this watch in January, it is now NOVEMBER... battery still running, all dials working, few minor scratches on the band (I do wear it daily)... but all in all, this is still the best watch I've ever bought! I get compliments ALL THE TIME. I did the low-key gunmetal color, now I'm getting the flashier all gold DZ7287.... Watch out, here I come!
customer_reviews.author: stephen spooner

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel authentic
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased Diesel watches before from Macys and the actual Diesel store and they are much heavier and feel more durable. This watch looked very nice but just did not feel authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Ixarelis Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself for my birthday. Love it so much. Awesome watch!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Macier

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a Christmas gift for my Fiancé, and he absolutely LOVED it. The watch is very elegant and adds a great touch to his outfits! The face is big, but he is very athletic so it looks great on him!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: nice looking watch..
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a gift for myself an i love it..have received plenty of compliments..
customer_reviews.author: annette

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this item. I purchased it for my other half as a Valentine’s Day gift , once received I opened the package to inspect it and it came damaged, what I thought would be a BRAND NEW WATCH , isn’t new at all. There are scuff marks & scratches on it
customer_reviews.author: Maeson Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Very good watch for a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is made of top quality materials and has impeccable finish. It’s style is social, but it can be used with less formal clothes. Although it is not the proposal it is nice to know that it’s 100 meters waterproof, for eventual dives in suits! :D
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: He loved It!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for the Hubby. He loved it! He loved the color changing crystal, the size and leather of the strap.
customer_reviews.author: MsSandraRI

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite watches I own I get compliments on it every ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite watches I own I get compliments on it every time I wear it! Love the way the glass on the dial changes colors
customer_reviews.author: Jorge victorino

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: band has already broke after wearing it about 3 times
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love it, a real good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks so nice. I wear it every day for work and to go out sometimes. I have received many compliments about it. Perfect size for my wrist
customer_reviews.author: JayMat

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: It looks so sexy on my husbands wrist. He loves it a lot!! If he didn't he would tell me! So I did a good job on this one. It is a large watch but my husband is a body builder so his wrists and arms are large so the big watch face looks good on him!
customer_reviews.author: Arleigh Turley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it highly looks high quality and feels great on ...
customer_reviews.text: Recommend it highly looks high quality and feels great on the wrist. It's a big but nothing like the big daddy watch thats a little too big for my taste .
customer_reviews.author: Aldegundo espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, nice color scheme
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, nice color scheme, weight, link removal is a bit tedious but not impossible. All the other reviews make it seem like a huge monster of a timepiece but its manageable. I can't get over the crispness of the angles and the overall design. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: I would do it all over again!
customer_reviews.text: I received my Diesel within 5 day from the day of my order, and haven't taken it off since. I like my diesel very much. It looks good on my wrist, and I've received a number of compliments about it, along with questions as to where did I get it. I'm very happy about my purchase. Everything was so easy. From picking it out, to ordering it, to receiving it via the U.S.P.S. to setting the time and date. Yes, I'm very please with my Diesel. And would do it again in a heart beat. WAG,
customer_reviews.author: WAG

customer_reviews.title: i love this watch
customer_reviews.text: i love this watch. i have now two Mega Chiefs ( this Black one and a Gold one). had to adjust it 1 link but other then that one of my favorites and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R.

product_meta.title: Diesel Men's Mega Chief Stainless Steel Chronograph Quartz Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Timeless with a twist, you'll love the terrific styling of this sleek Diesel® timepiece!
 * Stainless steel case.
 * Leather band with adjustable buckle closure.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement, three sub-dials, and a date display window.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Black dial features silver-tone hour markers.
 * Water resistant 10 ATM/100 meters.
 * Imported.
